sections.heading: S2. Ep2. Talking with Seamus Egan about his experiences as a business leader at Besix Watpac

sections.content: In this week's podcast, we talk with +[Seamus Egan](https://www.linkedin.com/in/seamus-egan-54655434/)+, New Business Manager here in Melbourne for +[Besix Watpac](https://besixwatpac.com/)+ – the international Construction and Engineering Group.
Seamus has a wealth of building project experience, from London to Melbourne – he has worked on and delivered a significant number of projects running into hundreds of millions.

We talk about his career in the industry, how it started, and how it's progressed. About teams and projects, and winning and delivering projects – of course, he gave a good insight into Besix and what we can expect from them having taken on the well-established Watpac group over the last few years.
Amongst other things, in this podcast we discuss:

items: His experiences as the new Business Manager at Besix Watpac
Bringing the right project team together
The impact of Covid and the war in Ukraine on the construction industry

sections.content: If you have an interest in the Melbourne building industry, building and developing a company within the industry, or have an interest in what takes place within a business of this size, then have a listen.
